Wisdom: هُدِيَ [هَدَى اللَّهُ‏] مَنِ ادَّرَعَ لِبَاسَ الصَّبْرِ وَالْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: The one who wears the garment of piety and certitude is [truly] guided
Guided is the one who puts on the garment of religion
One who practices Islam properly is [truly] guided

Wisdom: هُدِيَ مَنْ سَلَّمَ مَقَادَتَهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَوَلِيِّ أَمْرِهِ
enWisdom: Guided is the one who submits to the guidance of Allah and His Prophet and the one vested with His authority
One who purifies his faith is guided

Wisdom: هُدِيَ مَنْ أَطَاعَ رَبَّهُ وَخَافَ ذَنْبَهُ
enWisdom: Guided is the one who obeys his Lord and fears his sins

Wisdom: إِذَا أَنْتَ هَدَيْتَ لِقَصْدِكَ فَكُنْ أَخْشَعَ مَا تَكُونُ لِرَبِّكَ
enWisdom: When you are guided to your goal then be most submissive in front of your Lord

Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ عَبْداً سَمِعَ حُكْماً فَوَعَى وَدُعِيَ [فَدُعِيَ‏] إِلَى رَشَادٍ فَدَنَى وَأَخَذَ بِحُجْزَةِ هَادٍ فَنَجَا
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy on the servant who hears a ruling so he heeds it, is invited to the right path so he approaches it, and holds on to the guide so he is saved

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ سَلَكَ طَرِيقَ السَّلَامَةِ بِبَصَرِ مَنْ بَصَّرَهُ وَطَاعَةِ هَادٍ أَمَرَهُ
enWisdom: Blessed is he who follows the course of peace by the sight of the one who shows him the way and by obeying the guide who instructs him

Wisdom: فَازَ مَنِ اسْتَصْبَحَ بِنُورِ الْهُدَى وَخَالَفَ دَوَاعِيَ الْهَوَى وَجَعَلَ [جمل‏] الْإِيمَانَ عُدَّةَ مَعَادِهِ وَالتَّقْوَى ذُخْرَهُ وَزَادَهُ
enWisdom: Successful is the one who gets illumination from the lamp of guidance, opposes the calls of [his] vain desire, makes faith the equipage for his Hereafter and [makes] God-wariness his reserve and provision

Wisdom: قَدْ دُلِلْتُمْ إِنِ اسْتَدْلَلْتُمْ وَوُعِظْتُمْ إِنِ اتَّعَظْتُمْ وَنُصِحْتُمْ إِنِ انْتَصَحْتُمْ
enWisdom: You have been guided if you seek guidance and have been admonished if you seek admonishment and have been advised if you seek advice

Wisdom: كَفَاكَ مِنْ عَقْلِكَ مَا أَبَانَ لَكَ رُشْدَكَ مِنْ غَيِّكَ
enWisdom: It suffices for your intellect to distinguish for you right guidance from error

Wisdom: لَقَدْ بُصِّرْتُمْ إِنْ أَبْصَرْتُمْ وَأُسْمِعْتُمْ إِنْ سَمِعْتُمْ وَهُدِيتُمْ إِنِ اهْتَدَيْتُمْ
enWisdom: You are shown if you observe, made to hear if you listen, and guided if you seek guidance

Wisdom: لَقَدْ جَاهَرَتْكُمُ الْعِبَرُ وَزَجَرَكُمْ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ وَمَا بَلَّغَ عَنِ اللَّهِ بَعْدَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ مِثْلُ النُّذُرِ
enWisdom: Lessons [from events] have indeed become evident for you, and you have been deterred by what is in it of a deterrence; and after the Prophet of Allah, none have conveyed [the message] from Allah like the Warners

Wisdom: يَعْطِفُ الْهَوَى عَلَى الْهُدَى إِذَا عَطَفُوا الْهُدَى عَلَى الْهَوَى وَيَعْطِفُ الرَّأْيَ عَلَى الْقُرْآنِ إِذَا عَطَفُوا الْقُرْآنَ عَلَى الرَّأْيِ
enWisdom: He will direct desires towards guidance when [people] will have turned guidance towards desires, and he will turn his opinion towards the Qur’an when they turn the Qur’an towards their opinions
